name: European Sealing Association
goal: The European Sealing Association aims to be the collective voice of the majority of the manufacturing organisations based in Europe involved in manufacturing sealing devices. It provides guidance on installation practices and operates under the guidelines of aiming to be Influential, provide data which has Relevance and is a Knowledge source of information on sealing products.
euInitiatives:
IED Forum 13
Environmental Goods Agreement and European Drinking Water Directive
